#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(false);
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        int e,f;
        cin>>e>>f;
        int h=f-e;


        int dp[h+1];
        for(int i=0;i<=h;i++)
            dp[i]=999999999;
        int n;
        cin>>n;
        int p[n];
        int w[n];
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
            cin>>p[i]>>w[i];
         if(h==0)
        cout<<"The minimum amount of money in the piggy-bank is 0."<<"\n";
        else
        {


            dp[0]=0;
        for(int i=1;i<=h;i++)
        {
            if(i%w[0]==0)
            {
                dp[i]=(i/w[0])*p[0];
            }
        }
        for(int i=1;i<n;i++)
        {
            if(w[i]<=h)
            {
                dp[w[i]]=min(dp[w[i]],p[i]);
            }
            for(int j=1;j<=h;j++)
            {
                if(j>=w[i])
                {
                    if(dp[j-w[i]]!=0)
                    {
                        dp[j]=min(dp[j],dp[j-w[i]]+p[i]);
                    }
                    else
                        dp[j]=dp[j];
                }
                else
                    dp[j]=dp[j];
            }
        }

        if(dp[h]==999999999)
            cout<<"This is impossible."<<"\n";
        else
            cout<<"The minimum amount of money in the piggy-bank is "<<dp[h]<<"."<<"\n";
        }

    }
    return 0;
}
